Uses of Interface
de.mrapp.android.dialog.MaterialDialogBuilder.Validator

  • Packages that use MaterialDialogBuilder.Validator 
    Package Description
    de.mrapp.android.dialog  
    de.mrapp.android.dialog.listener  

    • Uses of MaterialDialogBuilder.Validator in de.mrapp.android.dialog

      Methods in de.mrapp.android.dialog with parameters of type MaterialDialogBuilder.Validator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MaterialDialogBuilder.addValidator(MaterialDialogBuilder.Validator validator)
      Adds a new validator to the dialog, which should be executed when the positive button is clicked.
      void MaterialDialogBuilder.removeValidator(MaterialDialogBuilder.Validator validator)
      Removes a specific validator from the dialog, which should not be executed when the positive button is clicked, anymore.

    • Uses of MaterialDialogBuilder.Validator in de.mrapp.android.dialog.listener

      Constructor parameters in de.mrapp.android.dialog.listener with type arguments of type MaterialDialogBuilder.Validator 
      Constructor and Description
      OnClickListenerWrapper(android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener listener, java.util.Set<MaterialDialogBuilder.Validator> validators, android.app.AlertDialog dialog, int buttonType)
      Creates a new wrapper, which implements the interface View.OnClickListener in order to delegate the method calls to encapsulated listener of the type DialogInterface.OnClickListener.
